name: microservice-tcp
description: Create a microservice with tcp protocol just for test!
author: Abolfazl Ghaderi <abolfazlghaderi.ir>

scripts.lint:f: pnpm --prefix task run lint:f && pnpm --prefix user run lint:f && pnpm --prefix token run lint:f && pnpm --prefix gateway run lint:f && pnpm --prefix mailer run lint:f && pnpm --prefix permission run lint:f
scripts.lint:nf: pnpm --prefix task run lint:nf && pnpm --prefix user run lint:f && pnpm --prefix token run lint:f && pnpm --prefix gateway run lint:f && pnpm --prefix mailer run lint:f && pnpm --prefix permission run lint:f
